alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 7:14PM EDT until July 20 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Logan County in west central Ohio... Southern Hardin County in west central Ohio... Northwestern Union County in central Ohio... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 713 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belle Center, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Bellefontaine, Belle Center, West Mansfield, Northwood, Mount Victory, Rushsylvania, Huntsville, Ridgeway, New Jerusalem, Byhalia, Broadway, Somersville, Big Springs, Essex, Mcmorran and Raymond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
